titles.title: Measuring the Economics Driving Investments and Access for Diversity Act of 2020

To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to require the Federal Communications Commission to consider market entry barriers for socially disadvantaged individuals in the communications marketplace report under section 13 of such Act.
Measuring the Economics Driving Investments and Access for Diversity Act of 2020
MEDIA Diversity Act of 2020
Measuring the Economics Driving Investments and Access for Diversity Act of 2020
MEDIA Diversity Act of 2020
Measuring the Economics Driving Investments and Access for Diversity Act of 2020
Measuring the Economics Driving Investments and Access for Diversity Act of 2020
MEDIA Diversity Act of 2020
MEDIA Diversity Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Communications and Technology.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote .
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported by the Committee on Energy and Commerce. H. Rept. 116-523.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 423.

action.text: Mr. McNerney moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 5567.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Measuring the Economics Driving Investments and Access for Diversity Act of 2020 or the MEDIA Diversity Act of 2020
This bill requires the Federal Communications Commission to consider market entry barriers for socially disadvantaged individuals in its biennial communications marketplace report.
